p: Policresulen is also known as formaldehyde- meta-cresolsulfonic acid. This drug has been classified by those in the ATC systems as D08AE02 (dermatological, antiseptic and disinfectants) and G01AX03 (gynecological anti-infectives and antiseptics). This drug is approved by the EMA Committee for Veterinary Medicinal Products for topical use and has been commercialized in several countries as Albothyl or Lotagen Â® as a hemostatic [ 180] and antimicrobial agent [ 181, 182].
